com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.scoreboards

Class CommonScoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.scoreboards.CommonScoreboard

  • public class CommonScoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single Scoreboard as displayed to a single Player. Also keeps track of teams and their objectives.
